programme.title: Goodbye to men's clubs
programme.short_synopsis: Supreme Court rules that all-male clubs discriminate.
programme.medium_synopsis: Writing on the wall for men's clubs as judges rule they infringe personal liberties.
programme.long_synopsis:
Writing on the wall for men's clubs as judges rule they infringe personal liberties.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
